title: Assassin (RUS)
description:
Year of release: 2008 
Genre: 3rd Person Stealth-Action  
Developer: Ubisoft Montreal 
Publishing house: Ubisoft Entertainment  
Platform: PC 
System requirements:  
Minimal system requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP SP2 or Vista CPU: Intel Pentium D 2.6Ghz or Athlon 64 X2 3800 RAM: 2Gb GPU: 256Mb DirectX 9.0 or 10.0-compatible to support Shader Model 3.0 SOUND: DirectX 9.0 or 10.0-compatible HDD: 12Gb 
Recommended system requirements: OS: Microsoft Windows XP SP2 or Vista SP1 CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4400 and above RAM: 3Gb GPU: 512Mb DirectX 9.0 or 10.0-compatible to support Shader Model 3.0 SOUND: DirectX 9.0 or 10.0-compatible (5.1) HDD: 16Gb 
Type of the edition: ??????? 
Language of the interface: only Russian 
????????: it is not required 
IN addition: the Decision of a problem with HighProfile (" a bug of the right button of the mouse ") we Go in. .. Documents and Settings \ Application Data Ubisoft Assassin&#039;s Creed, we open Assassin.ini, we add following parameters: [Test] HighProfileToggle=0
